docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve --livereload - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: GoHighLevel Tags
docs.text: This page contains a comprehensive list of GHL tags.

docs.title: REA Lead
docs.text: The opportunity is for a real estate agent we have yet to win.

docs.title: REA Current
docs.text: The opportunity is for a real estate agent we have won and is currently using us.

docs.title: REA Lost
docs.text: The opportunity is for a real estate agent we have lost.

docs.title: REA Out of Range
docs.text: The opportunity is for a real estate agent we have lost due to them not being within our servicing area.

docs.title: Private
docs.text: The opportunity is for a private client.

docs.title: Portables / Test n Tag
docs.text: The opportunity has fire extinguisher testing included.

docs.title: Retirement Living
docs.text: The opportunity relates to an aged care or retirement living job.

docs.title: Cold Dialler
docs.text: The opportunity has gone cold and needs to be nurtured.

docs.title: Commercial
docs.text: The opportunity relates to a commercial building job.

docs.title: Airbnb
docs.text: The opportunity relates to a Airbnb property job.

docs.title: Agent Lead Won
docs.text:
The goal of the automation is to mark an agent lead as won when its stage gets changed to won.

It achieves this by removing rea lead & rea lost tags and adding rea current along with removing from the Agents - First Contact automation.

docs.title: Lead Won
docs.text:
flowchart TD
    A[Opportunity Moved to Won]:::colour;
    B[Remove Tags For Leads and Lost]:::colour;
    C[Add REA Current Tag]:::colour;
    D[Remove from First Contact Emails]:::colour;

    A --> B
    B --> C
    C --> D

    classDef colour fill:#02A6F2,stroke-width:0px;

docs.title: Agents First Contact
docs.text:
The goal of the automation is to convert agents after initial contact via sending emails until they either respond or dont.

The automation will be triggered when an opportunity is added or moved to Agents - New Lead It achieves this by adding rea lead tag and sending a total of five emails over the course of eighteen days. If the agent does not respond by then, the previously added tag will be removed and they will me marked as lost.

docs.title: First Contact
docs.text:
flowchart TD
    A[Opportunity Added to or Moved to New Lead]:::colour;
    B[Remove Conflicting Tags & Add REA Lead]:::colour;
    C[Send 'Here to Help' Email & Wait 36h]:::colour;
    D{Agent Still in Lead State?}:::colour;
    E[Send '4.9 Reputation' Email & Wait 2d]:::colour;
    F{Agent Still in Lead State?}:::colour;
    G[Send 'Our Packages' Email & Wait 4d]:::colour;
    H{Agent Still in Lead State?}:::colour;
    I[Send 'Tenant Tips' Email & Wait 5d]:::colour;
    J{Agent Still in Lead State?}:::colour;
    K[Send 'Agent Follow Up' Email & Wait 5d]:::colour;
    L{Agent Still in Lead State?}:::colour;
    M[Remove Lead Tags And Mark As Lost]:::colour;
    N[Remove From Workflow]:::colour;

    A --> B
    B --> C
    C --> D
    D --"Yes"--> E
    E --> F
    F --"Yes"--> G
    G --> H
    H --"Yes"--> I
    I --> J
    J --"Yes"--> K
    K --> L
    L --"Yes"--> M
    D --"No"--> N
    F --"No"--> N
    H --"No"--> N
    J --"No"--> N
    L --"No"--> N

    classDef colour fill:#02A6F2,stroke-width:0px;
